ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein quest
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/13/99 1:44:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time, reuben@creditland.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/13/99 1:44:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
reuben@... writes:

<<
I have a question about the quest.. I am helping my enchanter friend with
the quest, and I was wondering.. If I get the items at the same time, ie she
has one set and i have my own.. if by the end of the quest, i can give her
the stuff I've got and she can complete it for me.. or is any of the stuff
No drop ? This way she can get a stein and I can get a stein also ? Oh yeah
i am high elf mage, so I know I can't get the item myself..

Thanks

Reuben
>>


None of the four components are "no Drop". However, I think some are "lore"
which means you can only carry one at a time.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro
